dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#GeneralDescription
dataObjects.title: Biology
dataObjects.description: Inhabits rocky riffles, runs and pools of creeks and small rivers.  Often found over sand in slow current.

dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#Distribution
dataObjects.description: North America:  Roanoke River drainage in Virginia and North Carolina, USA.
